Articles.Content:
Just started orbital construction on a large station and have used quantum struts well enough. However i'm clueless on how to use and place struts with the strut gun and quantum core. Am I missing a button press when in EVA near the gun or core?

Edited September 5, 2013 by em_3130
The strut gun connects to any part that is in front of it. The Quantum Core is useless IMO.

The Quantum Core works perfectly fine... click on the Core to start placing a strut, then click where you want the end-points to go. The Strut Guns have to be aimed correctly during construction... the red beams show the orientation of the extruded strut. If you dock anything in the path of that beam, a strut will form.
